participant_2.background:
My hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art.
My lifes goal is to be the worlds foremost encyclopedia salesman.
I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman.
I once saw peyton manning at the grocery store.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman.
That sounds interesting! How did you get into that?
I've always been fascinated by encyclopedias, and I love meeting new people and learning about their lives.
That's awesome! I'm not sure I've ever met an encyclopedia salesman before.
There aren't many of us left, but we're still out there!
What's the best part about your job?
The best part is getting to meet new people and learning about their lives. I also love the challenge of trying to sell encyclopedias to people who don't really need them.
I can imagine! I'm not sure I could ever be an encyclopedia salesman.
It's not for everyone, but it's a great job for people who are outgoing and love to learn.
What's the most interesting thing you've ever learned from a customer?
I once met a customer who was a famous scientist. He told me about his work on the human genome, and it was really fascinating.
That's amazing! I'm sure that was a really memorable experience.
It was! It's always great to meet someone who is passionate about their work.
What's the most difficult part about your job?
The most difficult part is getting people to listen to you. Most people don't want to be bothered by a salesperson, especially when they're trying to buy groceries.
I can imagine! I'm sure that can be really frustrating.
It can be, but it's also a challenge that I enjoy. I like the feeling of overcoming a challenge and getting a sale.
That's a good way to look at it.
Yeah, I think it's important to have a positive attitude, especially in sales.
I agree! I think a positive attitude can make all the difference.
